title: Mike Batt - A Songwriters Tale
description:
Description
CD 2008

&#039;A Songwriter&#039;s Tale&#039; is an collection of popular tracks from down the ages that have been written by popular songwriter Mike Batt. Having written for artists as diverse as Katie Melua and Art Garfunkel, this release see Batt re-recording his most popular tracks, and is a must for fans of artists such as the aforementioned Melua and Elton John. Includes thetracks &#039;Bright Eyes&#039;, &#039;Caravan Song&#039; and &#039;Closest Thing To Crazy&#039;. 

Track Listings 
1. Bright Eyes  
2. Soldier&#039;s Song  
3. Walls Of The World  
4. Winter&#039;s Tale  
5. Love Makes You Crazy  
6. System 605  
7. Caravan Song  
8. Caravans  
9. I Feel Like Buddy Holly  
10. Lady Of The Dawn  
11. Winds Of Change  
12. Please Don&#039;t Fall In Love  
13. I Watch You Sleeping  
14. Railway Hotel  
15. Closest Thing To Crazy  
16. Ride To Agadir
